title: Roche extends offer for Spark until Nov. 25
text:
Roche extends offer for Spark until Nov. 25

Stock Markets 2 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 06:24)

© Reuters. Roche extends offer for Spark until Nov. 25 ZURICH (Reuters) - Roche (S: ) said it extended its tender offer for shares of Spark Therapeutics, Inc. (O: ) until Nov. 25 to give the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) more time to complete their reviews of the $4.3 billion deal. The parties remain committed to the transaction and are working cooperatively and expeditiously with the FTC and the CMA, Roche and Spark said in a joint statement on Tuesday. The UK competition watchdog had launched an inquiry into the pending acquisition earlier this month.
